resources.string: Thank you for choosing U. Before we get started, please accept the terms of services and privacy policy.

You can always access them from:
https://u.cyberlink.com/terms
https://u.cyberlink.com/privacy
We have updated our terms and privacy policy to support the latest features and updates. Please accept the updated privacy policy to continue.
%1$s is one of the admins. If you remove them from the group, they will no longer be an administrator. Do you want to continue?
%1$s replied to a question in polls.
Enter your name and add a photo (optional) so that your contacts can recognize you.
Choose where you\'d like to import photo from…

Now you are able to have video
meetings with your contacts or host
webinars for a public audience.

to have a CyberLink account.

Now you are able to have video
meetings with your contacts or host
webinars for a public audience.

To enjoy the new features, we need you
 to provide your e-mail address and set a password.
U could not connect your account to this e-mail address, because it is already connected to another U account.

You will still be shown in their contacts list, but you will not receive any more messages from them. You also cannot send any more message to them.
Do you want to block this person?

You will no longer be shown in %1$s\'s contacts list. Your chat history and all photos sent to them will be removed from their device.\nTo send or receive messages from %2$s, you\'ll need to add them as a contact again.
Do you want to break up with

You will no longer be shown in their contacts list and your chat history and all photos sent/received will be deleted. This will also remove all the sent messages and photos from their device. Are you sure you want to continue?
Press here to go back to the main session
The breakout rooms were created.\nTap Enter to continue.
Breakout room session time is up. Please return to the main session
Host closed the breakout room. It will close in %1$d second(s).
You are the only one in the breakout room. Please wait for others to enter.
Press here to enter breakout room
The broadcast messages were sent to some of the groups already. Enter each group to check and recall message if you don\'t want it to be sent.
Scheduled broadcast does not support groups that are end-to-end-encrypted (E2EE). Tap [Broadcast Now] so all members will receive the messages right away.
The message could not be scheduled.
This type of message is not supported in groups that are end-to-end-encrypted (E2EE). Deselect the E2EE groups and then try again.
The message could not be scheduled.
The message was not sent to some of the selected groups because of an unstable network. Please check which groups did not receive the message.
The broadcast message was set up successfully. It will be sent at the specified time.
Do you want to leave and discard what you just wrote?
Enter text for the new topic…\nEverything you posted will be visible only to the group members.

This will start a group meeting with %1$d participants in “%2$s”. Continue?
The call could not be connected because your phone is not supported. You can try updating your phone or using the PC version of U to make a call.
Disconnected. Check your Internet connection and then try again
U cannot proceed to the meeting. Please check if it has ended.
This meeting is invitation only and requires all participants to use Face ID to join. You must create your Face ID before you can join.

Face ID verification is not supported
U could not connect you to this meeting.
Please contact the meeting host and request to be added to the participants list, so you can join this meeting.

Contact the host to invite you via the [+ Invite] button in U meeting.
You cannot join this invitation only meeting
This meeting is invitation only and you are not on the participants list.

The meeting room is full. %1$s can host up to %2$d participants.

You have not been invited to this meeting.
This meeting is invitation only, so you must sign in to your U account to join.
Please update your U app to join the meeting.
Your version of U is too old to join this meeting. Please update U and then try again.
You cannot join a new meeting because you are already in a meeting. You must first leave the current meeting.

This meeting is invitation only, so you must sign in to your U account to join.
This meeting is invitation only, so you must sign in to your U account to join.
U cannot proceed to the meeting. Please try again later.
U cannot proceed to the meeting. Please check if there is an app update available.
Waiting for %1$s to accept the call…

Hi,

Please click the following link now to join the meeting:

%1$s

Meeting ID: %2$s

You can also join the meeting by entering the ID if you have U installed on your computer or mobile device.

Hi,

Please click the following link now to join the U meeting:

%1$s

If you have not installed the U app, you can also click this link to download and install it.

-------------------------------------------------------------
It is recommended that you pre-test whether the meeting video is smooth before the starting the meeting. Check your webcam, microphone, speakers, Internet connection, etc., to ensure good meeting quality.

More Details: %2$s

Hi,

Please click the following link now to join the U meeting:

%1$s

Password: %2$s

If you have not installed the U app, you can also click this link to download and install it.

-------------------------------------------------------------
It is recommended that you pre-test whether the meeting video is smooth before the starting the meeting. Check webcams, microphones, speakers, Internet connections, etc., to ensure good meeting quality.

More Details: %3$s

Hi,

%1$s invited you to join this meeting, which you can join the meeting in the following ways:

-------------------------------------------------------------
It is recommended that you pre-test whether the meeting video is smooth before the starting the meeting. Check webcams, microphones, speakers, Internet connections, etc., to ensure good meeting quality.

More details：%1$s

2. Dial the U Meeting general number:
 Step 1. Dial the following number with your phone.
  %1$s
 Step 2. Enter the following meeting ID using the phone keypad once you hear the Interactive Voice Response to join the meeting.
  Meeting ID: %2$s

1. Via the U app:
 Please click the URL to join: %1$s
 (If you have not installed the U app, you can also click this link to download and install it).

%s cannot be set as a host because they are not using the latest version of U Meeting.
You may not be able to hear everyone clearly for a large meeting. Computers are recommended for large meetings.

Hi,

I just started a “[%1$s]“ group for us in the U app. Group members can create instant mobile forums to chat and share photos. If you don\'t have U installed, just use the link below to install the app on your device for free. With U installed, you can then use the same link to join the Group. Can\'t wait to chat with U!

%2$s

U - Photo Chat

%1$s has invited you to start chatting with U

What are U waiting for?
Install U now: https://www.cyberlink.com/U

To add %1$s as a contact, simply scan the QR code or click on the link below after you download U on your device.
%2$s

U is a brand new app for Android and iOS devices. It brings a fresh approach to messaging with a bunch of features you won\'t find in any other instant communication app.

 • Send photos to %1$s and add comments directly to them.
 • Merge photo and audio by adding voice notes to tell the story and background behind the pictures you send.
 • Create a single photo album that only you, %1$s and other selected contacts can add images to and comment on. Ideal for social gatherings and events.
 • Keep control of your content by recalling text, photos and stickers you\'ve sent to %1$s, even after they\'ve been read!

U
Social Media for Business

%1$s has invited you to start collaborating using U
Install U now: https://u.cyberlink.com/

To add %1$s as a contact, simply click on the link below or scan the QR code after you install U on your device.
%2$s

U is a virtual workspace where you can connect, build teams and grow partnerships. It’s simple, it’s social, and it works!

When enabled, the contacts list and chat messages cached on your device will be encrypted.

When you enable Local Data Encryption, the contacts list and chat messages cached on your device will be encrypted. This is to meet the requirements for some special organizations like medical or government. 

However, enabling this will cause the overall U app performance to become slower, especially for searching text messages. 

Once enabled, you will be signed out of the U app and you will be required to sign in again. All chats and files cached locally on your device will be removed and you can retrieve old messages from the U cloud server for your contacts and groups.
You will be signed out and all local cached messages and files will be removed. This operation is not recoverable. Continue?

Auto subscription for %s/year after free trial

Payment will be charged to your Google account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
